title: Jose Mourinho hopes Zlatan Ibrahimovic will make Manchester United return this month
description: Jose Mourinho is confident Zlatan Ibrahimovic will return to action for Manchester United later this month.
content: Ibrahimovic, who suffered a serious knee injury towards the end of last season, made a comeback in November and last featured for United in a 45-minute cameo against Burnley on Boxing Day.And speaking ahead of United's game with Huddersfield, Mourinho confirmed his expectation that Ibrahimovic and defender Eric Bailly will return later this month.More to follow....
